```{r}
# Horizontal Example

# Load the plotrix package
library(plotrix)
 
# Create a data frame with some example data
df <- data.frame(
  group = c("A", "A", "B", "B", "C", "C"),
  value = c(10, 12, 8, 9, 6, 7)
)
 
# Calculate the means and standard errors for each group
means <- aggregate(value ~ group, data = df, FUN = mean)
stderrs <- aggregate(value ~ group, data = df, 
                     FUN = function(x) sd(x) / sqrt(length(x)))
 
# Create a dot chart of the data
dotchart(means$value, labels = means$group, xlim = c(0, max(means$value) * 1.1),
         xlab = "Value")
 
# Add error bars representing the standard error of the mean
arrows(
  x0 = means$value - stderrs$value,
  y0 = 1:length(means$group),
  x1 = means$value + stderrs$value,
  y1 = 1:length(means$group),
  angle = 90,
  code = 3,
  length = 0.1
)
```
